name: Hawley's Run
description:
Re-live the dangerous events of January 6 from the perspective of a U.S. Senator! Escape the treasonous mob! Jump over fallen and beaten police officers! Collect bags of cash/Masculine Virtues to increase your Manhood score! Can you run away from the mob faster enough to collect more cash than your co workers?!

Donations for this game will be directed towards Planned Parenthood of the St. Louis Region and Southwest Missouri and the ACLU of Missouri.

https://www.patreon.com/chinacatsf

www.hawleys.run
